BuyPage.howMuchDoYouWant: How much do you want to buy?
BuyPage.beforeYouPurchase: Before your first purchase, read this
BuyPage.wePrideOurselves: We pride ourselves on our transparent fee structure:
BuyPage.buySellSpread: Gold typically has a difference between purchase and sale price, on Sugar it's between 1.5-2.1%, based on our supplier rates.
BuyPage.goldShopPremiums: Traditionally, gold shops have high premiums and buy back your gold up to 20-30% lower than market buying rates. We consistently strive to offer one of the industry's most competitive rates.
BuyPage.signedUpUsersGlobally: Sugar Wallet has over 10,000 signed up users globally. Our team is ex Google, Microsoft, KPMG employees.
BuyPage.registeredInNewZealand: Registered in New Zealand in 2020. We're a mission-driven entity. Our ambition is to champion financial equality globally. We envision a world where every individual can plan a future they dream of, without financial barriers. Our multicultural team operates from Turkey, London, India, and New Zealand.
BuyPage.officialNumber: For added transparency, here's our official New Zealand Business Number: 9429048494700
BuyPage.whenYouPurchaseGold: When you purchase gold, the money is deducted immediately from your card. We buy this gold in bulk.
BuyPage.whenYouSellGold: When you sell gold, the money is sent back to your given IBAN within 1 working day. Please note, our payment can bounce - after which we get in touch with you for the correct Account and IBAN details.
